author: Special Correspondent
text:
A short film on motivating voters to exercise their franchise was released by District Collector T. Karikalan here on Thursday.

The fill will be telecast through the local television channels for sensitising the masses to exercise their franchise, said Mr. Karikalan. The screening formed part of the campaign under Systematic Voter Education and Electoral Participation. He said that a toll-free telephone service 1950 has been set up at the Collector’s Office. People can lodge their election-related complaints to the control room. He said that strict action would be initiated against those filing wrong information or complaint.

The Collector said that a web casting committee has been constituted for uploading the proceedings of the election at all the 159 booths across the district. The Collector explained the procedure to be adopted for uploading the proceedings.
title: Karaikal administration releases short film on motivating voters
